user.description: If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/emontnemery/folkbibliotek-sverige

data_description.host: URL of the library's Axiell Arena service
data_description.name: Name for the config entry, for example the name of the account holder
data_description.password: Your library account password (usually the same as your library card PIN)
data_description.username: Your library account username (usually your Swedish personal identity number)

reauth_confirm.description: If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/emontnemery/folkbibliotek-sverige

data_description.host: URL of the library's Axiell Arena service
data_description.name: Name for the config entry, for example the name of the account holder
data_description.password: Your library account password (usually the same as your library card PIN)
data_description.username: Your library account username (usually your Swedish personal identity number)

error.account_locked: The account has been locked after too many login attempts, please contact your library for assistance.
error.cannot_connect: The expected login form could not be found. Please check the URL and try again.
error.invalid_credentials: The username or password is not valid.

abort.already_configured: An account with the same URL and username is already configured.
